text: The Danish Rugby Union (DRU) () is the governing body for rugby union in Denmark. Rugby began being played in Denmark in 1931 but it was not until 1950 that the DRU was established. In 1971 the DRU joined FIRA - Association of European Rugby followed by the Skandinavisk Rugby Union in 1974 before finally joining the International Rugby Board (now World Rugby) in 1988. ==References== ==See also== *Denmark national rugby union team Category:Rugby union in Denmark Category:Rugby union governing bodies in Europe Rugby Category:Sports organizations established in 1950
title: Danish Rugby Union
